original_text: And they gave by lot out of the tribe of the children of Judah, and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon, and out of the tribe of the children of Benjamin, these cities, which are called by their names.
korean_text: 유다 자손의 지파와 시므온 자손의 지파와 베냐민 자손의 지파 중에서 이 위에 기록한 여러 성읍을 제비 뽑아 주었더라

sentences.original_text: out of tribe of the children of Judah
and out of tribe of the children of Simeon
and out of tribe of the children of Benjamin
which are called by their names
